name: vsc-encrypt-file-with-env-variables
description: Allows you to encrypt a file using a password. Use case is using a shares password to encrypt various files on the fly. An example use case might be encrypting personal documents, such a journal, where you want to avoid typing in the password each time you want to encrypt/decrypt a document.

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile && yarn run lint
scripts.note2: To run a vsc extension you just debug the extensions.ts file
scripts.debug: f5 (or debug) in extensions.ts  (start yarn watch as well)
scripts.note3: Upload the new vsix file manually. Not worth tying to automate this at this point.
